main event: On July 4, 1963, a witness observed a yellow object with a row of red lights moving slowly back and forth in Greensboro, North Carolina.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 2-3 minutes,It had a size suggesting it was a large craft although it appeared at treetop level,The object seemed to hover and then rapidly ascended,The witness was watching fireworks when the sighting occurred,The concluded evaluation stated 'INSUFFICIENT DATA FOR EVALUATION'.
sighted object: a yellow object with a row of red lights
witness description: The witness was an 18-year-old male who was familiar with celestial phenomena and was observing a fireworks display at the time.
